headline: Ex-Assembly Speaker’s Graft Conviction Partly Overturned
abstract: Prison is still likely for Mr. Silver, the once-powerful New York State Assembly speaker.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court on Tuesday partly overturned the 2018 corruption conviction of Sheldon Silver, once the powerful speaker of the New York State Assembly, but allowed much of the conviction to stand — most likely ending his hopes of remaining out of prison.
